item.title: About jopen
item.description:
Welcome to jopen

What is jopen?

The name “jopen” is made up of the words “jo” (my nickname) and “open” (referring to its open-source nature). jopen is a blog about mostly tech-related projects I do for fun. In fact, jopen itself is one of them!

Why did I start it?

I wanted to take notes on the process of my projects, and there was no reason to keep them private. So, I made jopen, to learn in public.
item.content:
Welcome to jopen

What is jopen?

The name “jopen” is made up of the words “jo” (my nickname) and “open” (referring to its open-source nature). jopen is a blog about mostly tech-related projects I do for fun. In fact, jopen itself is one of them!

Why did I start it?

I wanted to take notes on the process of my projects, and there was no reason to keep them private. So, I made jopen, to learn in public.

How did I make it?

Here is a whole post about how this blog works. But basically, I built it using Hugo.

Who is behind this?

My name is yusef. I was born in 2002, and I’m currently an elementary teacher and web designer based in Tehran. I like computers and am passionate about open source concepts (beyond just software)â€”a geek/nerd, if you will.
This is my portfolio/CV and you can find me pretty much everywhere on the internet under the username jfryusef and email me [at] gmail [dot] com.

How can I support it?

You can support me (and therefore jopen) with cryptocurrencies. Here is the URL to a page with the QR codes.
Thank you for your interest in supporting me financially!
